text: Alessandro Giannessi was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Tallon Griekspoor won the title after defeating Sumit Nagal 6–2, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Banja Luka Challenger - Singles 2019 Singles
title: 2019 Banja Luka Challenger – Singles
